file_content.text: No, I haven't cleaned up. Do you know how much a good shower costs on Tatooine?
My people say someone ripped through Ghar Bodya's camp. Can I spot talent, or what?
I trust you have--whoo. Urgh. If I knew his head was going to stink this badly, I'd have given you a refrigeration unit.
Thanks, you can wrap that back up--ugh.
This is your evidence, whether it drips or not.
You'll need it as proof.
Ugh. One more thing the guys in the cells will owe me for. They're going to be cleaning my bantha ranch.
I did my part. Your turn.
It's alright, I haven't forgotten.
You said you wanted to stop torture. Now hold your nose and take it away.
Don't be squeamish now.
No thanks, that's fine, ugh. You can hold on to it, let me get your credits.
Nasty as this is, it's better than what was going on before. I just couldn't personally smell it.
Do you see a garbage chute?
The Imperials continue to torture my associates. Kill Ghar Bodya.
Hello. That's right, I'm talking to you. I know who you are, and I bring a proposal.
I'm Shayl Tasao. I speak for a small consortium of the Exchange on Tatooine.
They want a warlord dead, and they think you're the one to do it.
Let's start with a name.
Who is this person?
You think I'll work for crime lords?
I'm no hired thug.
Oh, are you an upstanding citizen? I assure you I have the public safety in mind.
Maybe the Empire's already given me a better offer.
I'm not that easy to hire.
So? Kill once, collect twice.
Why is that?
You're loyal to the Empire but not local government. Around here, we don't talk to local Empire.
The target is the warlord Ghar Bodya. He killed a Sith apprentice sent to assassinate him. And it's costing all of us.
Imperials are torturing and killing Exchange members to find his location. Now, I know where Ghar is, but I came to you. Understand why?
I understand. I suggest you tell me his location.
Where is he?
You don't want to reward the Empire for imprisoning your friends.
You'd look weak otherwise.
I wouldn't say "friends," but I owe some people.
So what?
You can do a service to the Empire and profit at the same time.
Ghar and his mercenaries are hiding in the desert. I saw them taking shade by a derelict sandcrawler.
We can pay for his head. That ugly bantha stain is done. The Empire agrees, the Exchange agrees. How about you?
The Sith do not fail. This warlord will learn that.
I will teach Ghar a lesson.
He will know suffering far worse than he has caused.
I will not be kind to Ghar.
You were right to bring this to me. I'll see it done.
I'm in.
Well, if a large pile of credits has such a strong opinion on the matter, I have to say yes.
I heard "payment." I'm in.
I'll exterminate everything.
Good. Now, he does move around a lot--don't expect to find him exactly at the sandcrawler.
You bring me his head and I'll bring you the credits.
No... this is too convenient. You don't need me.
Seems fishy. [Refuse quest]
Our best hitters are in prison. And anyone less, Ghar would annihilate.
Come back and see me sometime.
